text: Boyhood Productions is a productions based in Kolkata. The show has produced three popular shows that air on Star Jalsha. They are Pratidaan, Jiban Jyoti, Bijoyini and Ke Apon Ke Por. The producers of Boyhood Productions are Gurjit Singh, Surinder Singh, and Sushanta Das. ==Television== *Ke Apon Ke Por (2016) *Pratidaan (2017) *Jiban Jyoti (2018) *Bijoynee (2019) *Gramer Rani Binapani (2021) Category:Indian television
title: Boyhood Productions
